sources.name: index.ts
sources.content:
export * from "./empty-state.style"
export type {
  EmptyStateContentProps,
  EmptyStateDescriptionProps,
  EmptyStateIndicatorProps,
  EmptyStateRootProps,
  EmptyStateTitleProps,
} from "./empty-state"
export {
  EmptyStateContent,
  EmptyStateDescription,
  EmptyStateIndicator,
  EmptyStatePropsContext,
  EmptyStateRoot,
  EmptyStateTitle,
  useEmptyStatePropsContext,
} from "./empty-state"
export * as EmptyState from "./namespace"

sources.name: namespace.ts
sources.content:
export {
  EmptyStateContent as Content,
  EmptyStateDescription as Description,
  EmptyStateIndicator as Indicator,
  EmptyStatePropsContext as PropsContext,
  EmptyStateRoot as Root,
  EmptyStateTitle as Title,
  useEmptyStatePropsContext as usePropsContext,
} from "./empty-state"
export type {
  EmptyStateContentProps as ContentProps,
  EmptyStateDescriptionProps as DescriptionProps,
  EmptyStateIndicatorProps as IndicatorProps,
  EmptyStateRootProps as RootProps,
  EmptyStateTitleProps as TitleProps,
} from "./empty-state"
